title: ClickTight Convertibles: Rear-Facing Lap Belt Installation with ClickTight
description:
How to install the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats in rear-facing mode using the vehicle lap belt and the ClickTight Installation System. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to install the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats in rear-facing mode using the vehicle lap belt and the ClickTight Installation System. 
**Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles
